resources.string: Hope you know a lot and still love life
Please grant unlimited rights to the battery

It is only valid in full screen. The interface follows the direction of the phone sensor when it is turned on, and locks the direction of the interface when it is turned off. (The rotation interface can be controlled by the navigation button)
This function is valid only in full-screen mode. When the page of the master terminal is rotated, it attempts to rotate the controlled terminal
Sets whether the navigation bar is displayed by default in small window and full screen modes
Please set the local ADB port first (on the login page)
Failed. Please check whether wireless debugging is enabled
* Currently, the account is only used to automatically add reachable devices
The full screen status will intercept the return
When turned on, it will attempt to transmit audio, and the controlled end needs to be on Android 12
Sets the maximum size of the screen length and width
Maximum frame rate limit, the lower the value, the more sluggish the picture, but the smaller the traffic, the delay will be reduced
The larger the bit rate, the smaller the video loss, and the larger the video volume. You are advised to set the value to 4. If the bit rate is too high, the delay increases
H265 is preferred, the video size is small and the delay is low. The actual situation is mainly supported. If the video is abnormal, try to close it
OPUS is preferred, the audio volume is small and the delay is low, and the actual support is mainly
When enabled, the controlled screen is kept closed during the control process
After this function is enabled, the controlled terminal is automatically locked when the connection is disconnected
After this function is enabled, the system enters the full-screen state directly after the connection is successful
After this function is enabled, the resolution of the controlled end will be automatically changed. Therefore, the resolution may not be automatically restored (you can manually restore it)
When enabled, use ADB tunnel to transmit data, otherwise use a separate port (ADB port plus 1) to transmit data
